alert.note: Alert for Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 9:01AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches through this evening, highest amounts generally toward the Sturgis area. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Rapid City area and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
